title: (x) Empire logo serif face - Palatino {Marc O}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051759im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/EMPIRE_5623.jpg)

Hello All!  
Was wondering if anyone knew what font the “EMPIRE” is?  
Thanks!  
Sean

 [‹ Bugatti logo sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051759/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35271 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) KNI bold script logo - Eclat {Patricia, Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051759/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35273 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Smacken3

comments.content:
Palatino, either the medium or bold weight.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/palatino/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051759/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/palatino/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/palatino/")
Great! Thank you! How do you know typefaces so well!?? I deal with fonts all day and don’t remember half of em!
Sorry dude, but if we told you we’d have to kill you… ;^)

I was a novice designer when DTP was first introduced and font choice was extremely limited. Since Palatino was one of the 35 fonts included in the original Laserwriter, I saw it (and used it) a \*lot\*. I mean a \*lot\*. ;)

Plus, you start to recognize Zapf-isms like the open P and R.
Yves, don’t you mean, “If we told you, you’d kill yourself.” ;^)
